resources.string: Please check your internet connection and try again!
Would you like to do some mind exercise today?
An error has occurred, please try again!

This game tests your math skills as well as your quickness and attention. When the game starts, you will see a math operation that needs to be done. After doing this, you must find the correct answer from the options above and mark it. But you have to be careful and fast because the options will be constantly changing. In the example above, the numbers are moving based on a certain period.

When you look at the table above, there is an action that needs to be done at the bottom of the screen and you must do this within the time given to you. After that, you have to choose the correct answer from the constantly moving answer options. You will earn points as you get it right in the game.

There are two different modes in the game. Level mode is a game style based on the player\'s passing the specified levels. The player tries to get from the first level to the last level. When you finish the last level, the game is completed successfully.

In infinite mode, the game continues until you make a mistake. In both game styles, the game difficulty will increase as your score increases and your level increases. The points you collect in the endless mode are reflected in the top scores list.

First of all, we do not recommend you to play this game without playing the first game. Because this game was developed as a upper version of the other game. If you haven\'t played it, it will be more appropriate to practice in the first game to get used to the pace of the game. In this game, as in the other game, you have to do the given operation correctly, and you have to find your answer among the moving options.

There is an added feature in this level: Colored Numbers. If you look at the example above, you should have seen that the numbers to be operated are in different colors. Your mission in this game; along with finding the correct answer to the mathematical operation, it will also be to find the mixture of the colors of these two numbers among the options.

In the above operation, 28 and 29 add up to 57. But among the options there are two 57. Here comes the importance of colors. In the next step, you need to determine that the mixture of the colors of these numbers (28 and 29) is purple and click on the number 57 whose background color is purple in response.

You may not know the mixtures of colors. Considering this possibility, we wanted to share the mixtures of colors. Only three different color mixes will appear in the game. We recommend that you start the game after examining the table above and understanding the color mixtures.

There are two different modes in the game. Level mode is a game style based on the player\'s passing the specified levels. The player tries to get from the first level to the last level. When you finish the last level, the game is completed successfully.

In infinite mode, the game continues until you make a mistake. In both game styles, the game difficulty will increase as your score increases and your level increases. The points you collect in the endless mode are reflected in the top scores list.

Here is an original game that tests your attention and quickness. In the table above, you can see that GRAY is written on the card under the timer. You may have noticed that "COLOR" is written in the upper left. Your goal here will be to search for the color in the text that says "GRAY", that is, orange, as "COLOR" in the options below. Then you should count how many orange texts there are and mark the correct answer in the options.

The situation in "TEXT" is also slightly different from the previous one. In the example above, you must have noticed that the card below the timer says GRAY, and the card in the upper left says "TEXT". Your goal here will be to search for “GRAY” as text in the options below. So you should look for the text “GRAY” no matter what color it is painted. Then you should count how many there are and mark the correct answer in the options.

In the third situation in this game, both the color names of the words and the colors in them must be the same. In the table above, you can see that there are 4 words that meet these conditions. For example, you must have seen that the color of "YELLOW" from the words in the box above is also yellow.

There are two different modes in the game. Level mode is a game style based on the player\'s passing the specified levels. The player tries to get from the first level to the last level. When you finish the last level, the game is completed successfully.

In infinite mode, the game continues until you make a mistake. In both game styles, the game difficulty will increase as your score increases and your level increases. The points you collect in the endless mode are reflected in the top scores list.
